2025-12-27T17:00:00.CONTENT_EN: All car parks at West Kowloon Cultural District are full. Members of the public are encouraged to take public transport to the West Kowloon Cultural District.
2025-12-27T17:00:00.CONTENT_CN: 西九文化區內所有停車場現已泊滿車輛，前往西九文化區一帶的市民請使用公共交通工具。

2025-12-28T14:31:00.CONTENT_EN: All car parks at West Kowloon Cultural District are full. Members of the public are encouraged to take public transport to the West Kowloon Cultural District.
2025-12-28T14:31:00.CONTENT_CN: 西九文化區內所有停車場現已泊滿車輛，前往西九文化區一帶的市民請使用公共交通工具。

2025-12-29T07:14:00.CONTENT_EN: Traffic is busy at Man Kam To Road northbound near Kong Nga Po Road. Motorists are encouraged to remain tolerant. Cross-boundary public transport services to and from Man Kam To Control Point may be affected and passenger waiting time may be longer. Passengers are advised to be patient.
2025-12-29T07:14:00.CONTENT_CN: 文錦渡路北行近缸瓦甫路交通繁忙，駕駛人士請保持忍讓。來往文錦渡管制站的跨境公共運輸服務或會受到影響，乘客候車時間或會延長，請耐心等候。

2025-12-29T14:16:00.CONTENT_EN: Traffic at Man Kam To Road northbound near Kong Nga Po Road has resumed normal. Cross-boundary public transport services to and from Man Kam To Control Point has resumed.
2025-12-29T14:16:00.CONTENT_CN: 文錦渡路北行近缸瓦甫路的交通已恢復正常，來往文錦渡管制站的跨境公共運輸服務已恢復正常。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 機場管理局 晚間繁忙時段

2025-12-23T17:30:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to the high passenger traffic during the holiday season, all long-term parking spaces for private vehicle and light goods vehicle at Hong Kong International Airport are fully occupied. Travellers are recommended to take public transport when travelling to the airport to avoid any unnecessary delays.
2025-12-23T17:30:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於假期人流暢旺，香港國際機場所有私家車及輕型客貨車長期停車位已全部泊滿，建議旅客使用公共交通工具前往機場，以免不必要的延誤。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: MTR Train service enhancement during New Year
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 港鐵新年期間加強服務

2025-12-30T12:36:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that to facilitate travel needs, train services will be enhanced with more frequent trips on several rail lines during different periods from now until 4 January. 

New Year's Eve (31 December)
Overnight service:
◦All local lines (except the Airport Express, Disneyland Resort Line and journeys to or from Lo Wu and Lok Ma Chau stations on the East Rail Line)
◦7 Light Rail routes 505, 507, 610, 614P, 615P, 751 and 706

Extended service hours:
◦East Rail Line service to/from Lo Wu (to/from Lok Ma Chau will not be extended)
◦Disneyland Resort Line
◦Bus route 506, K51 and K54A

The last Airport Express will depart from AsiaWorld-Expo on:
◦31 December: 1:30am the next day
◦1 January: 1:00am the next day

Please refer to MTRCL's website for more information. 

Crowd management measures may be implemented in stations when necessary.
2025-12-30T12:36:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，為方便大家外出，即日至1月4日期間，多條本地鐵路綫於不同時段加密班次，加強列車服務。

除夕夜（12月31日)
通宵行駛：
◦本地鐵路綫（不包括機場快綫、迪士尼綫及東鐵綫往返羅湖及落馬洲站)
◦7條輕鐵路綫505、507、610、614P、615P、751及706

延長服務時間：
◦東鐵綫往返羅湖站（往返落馬洲站不會延長服務）
◦迪士尼綫
◦3條巴士綫506、K51及K54A

機場快綫博覽館站尾班車亦會延後：
◦12月31日：延至翌日凌晨01:30開出
◦1月1日：延至翌日凌晨01:00開出

詳情請參閲港鐵網頁。

部分車站在人多時或會實施客流管理措施。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Special traffic and transport arrangements for departure of concert at the Kai Tak Stadium on New Year's Eve and New Yea
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 啟德主場館除夕及元旦演唱會離場特別交通及運輸安排

2025-12-30T15:30:00.CONTENT_EN:
Concerts will be held at the Kai Tak Stadium on the evenings of the New Year's Eve and New Year's Day. As a large number of spectators are expected to disperse at the same time, the Transport Department (TD) appeals to those leaving the venue to take the MTR as far as possible. 

Details of Public Transport Services

MTR:
- Train frequencies of the Tuen Ma Line (TML) and East Rail Line (ERL) of MTR will be increased. Standby trains will be arranged to enhance service when necessary;

- Of note, for cross-boundary travellers, the departure time of the last MTR train to Lo Wu Station via interchanging at Tai Wai Station on the ERL are as follows:
For more details, please visit: https://www.td.gov.hk/en/special_news/spnews.htm

- Cross-boundary travellers should arrive the relevant stations in good time to take the last train to Lo Wu for their journeys to the Mainland. Afterwards, travellers may take the ERL to Sheung Shui Station and then the KMB route No. 276B or N73 to Lok Ma Chau (San Tin) Public Transport Interchange, and transfer to the Lok Ma Chau-Huanggang cross-boundary shuttle bus (Yellow Bus) for their journey to the Mainland. 

- To tie in with the special round-the-clock passenger clearance arrangements of the Shenzhen Bay Port on New Year's Day, franchised bus companies will operate two special bus routes, Nos. NB2 and NB3, to provide services to and from Yuen Long/Tin Shui Wai and Tuen Mun respectively during the overnight period. Travellers attending the New Year's Eve concert can also take the TML to Yuen Long Station/Tin Shui Wai Station or Tuen Mun Station, and interchange with special bus routes, Nos. NB2 or NB3 respectively, to the Shenzhen Bay Port. 

Special bus routes:
- Eleven special bus routes have been arranged at the Sung Wong Toi Road Pick-up/Drop-off Area departing for ports and major districts across the territory;

- Cross-boundary travellers may take route No. SP12 to Lok Ma Chau (San Tin) Public Transport Interchange and transfer to the Lok Ma Chau-Huanggang cross-boundary shuttle bus (Yellow Bus) to Lok Ma Chau/Huanggang (LMC/HG) Port; or take route No. A25S to the Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge (HZMB) Hong Kong Port and transfer to the HZMB shuttle bus (Gold Bus) to Macao and Zhuhai; and

Taxis:
- The taxi pick-up/drop-off area at the Kai Tak Stadium (G/F outside Gate H) is opened for passenger boarding. In view of an outflux of spectators, the waiting time is anticipated to be longer and your patience is appreciated. 

Spectators are advised to take heed of the real-time information via on-site broadcast and the "Easy Leave" (easyleave. police. gov. hk) as well as the latest traffic news through the TD's website (www. td. gov. hk), the "HKeMobility" mobile application, radio and television broadcasts.
2025-12-30T15:30:00.CONTENT_CN:
啟德主場館將於除夕及元旦晚上舉行演唱會。由於同一時間離場觀眾較多，運輸署呼籲離場人士盡量乘搭港鐵。

公共運輸服務詳情

港鐵：
- 屯馬綫及東鐵綫將會加密班次，並在有需要時安排後備列車以加強服務；

- 過境旅客請注意，經大圍站接駁東鐵綫前往羅湖站的最後一班列車開出時間如下：
詳情請參看: https://www.td.gov.hk/tc/special_news/spnews.htm

- 過境旅客請及時前往上述車站，乘搭前往羅湖站的最後一班列車返回內地。其後，旅客可乘搭東鐵綫往上水站，轉乘九巴第276B或N73號線前往落馬洲（新田）公共運輸交匯處，轉乘落馬洲–皇崗過境穿梭巴士(皇巴)返回內地。

- 為配合深圳灣口岸在元旦日二十四小時通關的特別安排，專營巴士營辦商會於凌晨時段營運第NB2號和NB3號兩條特別巴士路線，分別提供往返元朗/天水圍和往返屯門的服務。參加除夕演唱會的旅客亦可乘搭屯馬綫前往元朗站/天水圍站或屯門站，分別轉乘第NB2號或NB3號特別巴士路線前往深圳灣口岸。

特別巴士路線：
- 當局已於宋皇臺道上落客區安排11條特別巴士路線前往口岸及港九新界各主要地區；

- 過境旅客可乘坐第SP12號線前往落馬洲（新田）公共運輸交匯處，轉乘落馬洲–皇崗過境穿梭巴士(皇巴)前往落馬洲/皇崗口岸；或乘搭第A25S號線前往港珠澳大橋香港口岸，轉乘港珠澳大橋穿梭巴士（金巴）前往澳門及珠海。

的士：
- 啟德主場館的士上落客區（H閘外地面）將開放供的士接載乘客。由於離場人士較多，預期輪候時間會較長，請耐心輪候登車。

　　觀眾請留意場地廣播和「離場易」（easyleave.police.gov.hk）提供的實時資訊，以及經運輸署網頁（www.td.gov.hk）、「香港出行易」流動應用程式、電台和電視台發放的最新交通消息。
